column1: Visitation will be Monday evening starting at 6 P.M. from the Funeral Home.Funeral services for Cathy A. Chesser will be held Tuesday afternoon (June 23
column2: 2015) at 3 P.M. from The Chapel of Frye Funeral Home in Nahunta with Rev. Mike Hendrix
column3: Rev. Leon Wilson & Bishop Raymond Willis.Interment will be in The Family Plot at The Oak Grove Cemetery in Raybon.
